results.title: Combined Treatment with Hydrophilic and Lipophilic Statins Improves Neurological Outcomes Following Experimental Cardiac Arrest in Mice.
results.text_hl: We tested whether two different types of statins, hydrophilic @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@ and lipophilic @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, attenuated @<m>DISEASE_Trauma_Nervous_System</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020196 @@@neurological injury@@@ following @DISEASE_Heart_Arrest @DISEASE_MESH:D006323 @@@CA@@@/CPR.
